backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented features for the Snake game including movement, controls, collision detection, scoring, restart functionality, and visual theming.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality in the Snake game application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the cyberpunk/neon game aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the GameLayout component.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with header, game area, instructions, tips, and footer with Caffeine.ai attribution, all styled with cyberpunk theme.
frontend/src/components/GameOverScreen.t: Modal overlay displaying final score and restart button when the game ends, with neon-styled design.
frontend/src/components/ScoreDisplay.tsx: Component showing current score and pause status with cyberpunk-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/SnakeGame.tsx: Core game component managing state, canvas rendering, snake movement, collision detection, food spawning, scoring, and speed progression.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook for managing ICP actor instances with authentication support and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Custom hook implementing a fixed time-step game loop using requestAnimationFrame with accumulator pattern for consistent updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardControls.t: Custom React hook that handles keyboard input for snake game controls (arrow keys for direction, space for pause, enter/space for restart) with direction validation to prevent 180-degree turns.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the Snake game runs entirely in the frontend without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a cyberpunk/neon color theme for both light and dark modes, including game-specific color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/types/game.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the Snake game including Position, Direction, Snake, Food, and GameState interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/collisionDetection.ts: Utility functions for detecting collisions in the Snake game: wall collisions, self-collisions, and food collisions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, including game-specific colors, custom animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for a Snake game including movement, controls, collision detection, scoring, restart functionality, and visual theming.
